ProviderPlugin.Name: Simple Dummy
ProviderPlugin.Description: This dummy plugin is used for unit tests.

Instance.Name: Simple Dummy 1
Instance.Description: This dummy plugin can be used to test the instantiation of the ProviderPlugin, the ProviderPluginInstance and the ProviderConnection. It is also possible to send some requests and get some repsonds.

Instance.Name: Wrong interface Version
Instance.Description: This plugins doestn't even exists but it is used to verify that the check for the required interface version works.
